actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: To make appropriations for fiscal year 2001 for the Federal share of certain construction costs of a sewage treatment facility in Waterbury, Connecticut.

summary.text: Appropriates funds for FY 2001 for Environmental Protection Agency State and tribal assistance grants for a grant to the city of Waterbury, Connecticut, for payment of the Federal share of a balloon payment due by the city in July 2001 for the construction of a sewage treatment facility.

titles.title: To make appropriations for fiscal year 2001 for the Federal share of certain construction costs of a sewage treatment facility in Waterbury, Connecticut.
